pageTitle: 機能説明 - マニュアルページセクション 5: 標準、環境、マクロ
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {28547=Link partner advertises 1000 full duplex capability, 30861=1000 Mb/s 4D-PAM5, 25002=Capable of 1000 full duplex operation, 28674=Link partner advertises 1000 half duplex capability, 26912=Advertise 1000 full duplex capability, 25112=Capable of 1000 half duplex operation, 30760=1000 Mb/s 8B/10B, 27026=Advertise 1000 half duplex capability}
textBeforeTable: The link_* kernel statistics show the link state at the local end of the connection. The above values define maximum capability. In many cases, lower speeds can occur. The cap_* statistics must be viewed to establish the range of capability. 1000 Mb/s 4D-PAM5 7 1000BaseT xcvr_inuse MII transceiver manufacturer and device ID lp_rem_fault Link partner advertises 10 half duplex capability 1000 Mb/s 8B/10B 6 1000BaseX 100 Mb/s PAM5X5 5 100BaseT2 100 Mb/s 4B/5B 4 100BaseX 100 Mb/s 8B/6T 3 100BaseT4 10Mb/s Manchester encoding 2 10Mb/s MII present, but nothing connected 1 none Undefined 0 other MII transceiver type, based on the following list: xcvr_id MII address in the 0 to 31 range of the physical layer device in use for a given Ethernet device xcvr_addr The xcvr_* kernel statistics provide information about the physical layer device that is in use. Fault 1 Link is good 0 Fault value the remote system reports lp_cap_10hdx Link partner advertises 10 full duplex capability lp_cap_10fdx Link partner advertises 100 half duplex
textAfterTable: Symmetric pause capable, advertising asymmetric Rx pause only. 1 0 1 0 Symmetric pause capable, advertising symmetric Rx and Tx pause capability. 1 0 1 1 Symmetric pause capable and advertised. 1 1 0 0 Symmetric and asymmetric pause capable, but not advertised. 1 1 0 1 Symmetric and asymmetric Tx pause capable. Only asymmetric Tx pause advertised. 1 1 1 0 Symmetric and symmetric Tx pause capable. Only symmetric pause advertised.
